text: I'm Candace Worley I am the chief
product officer for Ping Identity well
for our organization we're in the
identity industry obviously and what we
see is that many organizations have
traditionally been very focused on the
workforce use case and leveraged
third-party identity companies for that
use case
however they built their customer
identity capability in-house we're now
seeing them rely on third parties and as
they go through their digital
transformation in that move to the cloud
it's a natural transition point for them
to look to a third party to deliver not
only that infrastructure capability but
also the Siam identity capability well
obviously AWS is the leader in the
market as it relates to what they do
many of our customers trust AWS and AWS
is a critical part of delivering not
only our SAS Solutions but also our
software in the cloud AWS helps my
software company be more able to deliver
value that customers are looking for
today whether that's in the context of
enabling them to leverage uh AWS Cloud
for their software capabilities or
whether or not they want to go
full-blown SAS
thank you
